mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_id, post_id, reply_content, replyer) values(seq_reply.nextval,#{postId},#{replyContent},#{replyer})
mapper.select: select reply_id, post_id, reply_content, replyer,reply_regdate from (select /*+INDEX(reply idx_reply)*/ rownum rn, reply_id, post_id, reply_content, replyer, reply_regdate from reply where post_id=#{post_id} and rownum <= #{cri.page}*#{cri.amount}) where rn > (#{cri.page}-1) * #{cri.amount}
select count(*) from reply where post_id=#{postId}
